name: Fantômes du passé (comment l'histoire est entrée en moi)

Also known as: Ghosts from the Past (How History Got Into Me)
Production companies: Centre du Cinéma et de l'Audiovisuel de la Fédération Wallonie-Bruxelles

description: How to talk about History, the big one and the small one, ours and that of each of us? Watching television, browsing the Internet, rummaging through the stock of world archives? Or more simply, going back to our own images that bu...
